content: 'PROP NOW INITIALIZING AND THEN DISCONNECTING THIS TERMINAL.' Chapter 6. Configuring z/VM 201 SAY '-----------------------------------------------------------' 'CP SLEEP 2 SEC' 'EXEC PROPST PROP DISCONN' 15.Save the changes and quit XEDIT: ====> file 16.Remain logged on as OPERATOR but launch an additional 3270 session and log on as LGLOPR. 17.Position the 3270 sessions for OPERATOR and LGLOPR so that you can see both sessions at the same time. 18.In the session for OPERATOR, issue the command to IPL CMS: ===> ipl cms 19.You see messages in both consoles. The OPERATOR console states that PROP is starting and then disconnects your session. The LGLOPR console notifies you that PROP initialized with the following message: * MSG FROM OPERATOR: PROP running with routing table PROP RTABLE D1 20.Repeat steps 11 - 15 for every other node in the SSI cluster. 21.You can leave the LGLOPR console open if you want to continue observing messages as you proceed through the next tasks. If not, issue
